data.comment: The match has started at Ajinomoto Stadium.

Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 6, Yoshiro Imamura awards the home team a throw-in.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.

Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?

Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.

In the minute 15, Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Tokyo push forward at Ajinomoto Stadium and Kyosuke Tagawa gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Yokohama Marinos defence.

In Tokyo Tokyo drive forward through Kyosuke Tagawa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.

In Tokyo, Tokyo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.

Tokyo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.

The match is over. Final score 0-4.
Tsuyoshi Watanabe blunders with an own goal. This makes it 0-3.
Great finish from Erik to give Yokohama Marinos a 0-4 lead.
